positions.title: Medical Lab Managing Partner
positions.description:
Clinical Trial Management
Phase I to IV Clinical Trials: Covers early to late clinical research to ensure the safety and efficacy of new therapies and drugs.
Multicenter Trial Coordination: Manages clinical trials at multiple sites to ensure consistency and data integrity.
Patient Recruitment and Retention
Patient Recruitment: Utilizes various channels to recruit suitable trial participants.
Patient Retention: Ensures high levels of patient engagement through ongoing communication and support.
Data Management and Analysis
Data Collection and Entry: Uses advanced data management systems to ensure data accuracy and timeliness.
Statistical Analysis: Provides comprehensive data analysis services to help interpret trial results and determine efficacy.
Regulatory Compliance
Institutional Review Board (IRB) Submissions: Ensures that all trials meet ethical standards.
Regulatory Document Preparation: Prepares and submits documents required by regulatory agencies such as the FDA.
Quality Assurance
Monitoring and Auditing: Regularly review trial processes to ensure compliance with GCP (Good Clinical Practice) standards.
Training and Education: Provides ongoing education and training to the research team to improve research quality.

positions.title: Chief Financial Officer
positions.description:
Formulate the financial objectives, policies and operating procedures of the company and report to the general manager and the board of directors according to the authorization

Establish and improve the organizational structure of the company's financial system, set up positions, clarify responsibilities, ensure the quality of financial and accounting information, reduce operating and management costs, ensure smooth information flow and improve efficiency

To provide financial descriptions of the 
company's business objectives, provide a basis for business management decisions, and regularly review and measure the company's business risks and adopt effective measures to prevent them

Review financial statements, submit financial analysis and management reports; participate in the analysis, demonstration and decision-making of investment projects

Follow up and analyze various financial indicators to reveal potential operational problems and provide management with reference for decision making; develop effective financing strategies and plans according to the actual operating conditions of the company, and use various financial instruments to ensure the optimal capital structure of the companyã€‚

positions.title: Finance Manager
positions.description:
Organize the development of financial management system and related regulations, and supervise the implementation

Develop, maintain and improve the company's financial management procedures and policies, and develop annual and quarterly financial plans

Responsible for the preparation and implementation of financial budget reports, monthly, quarterly and annual financial reports

Responsible for the company's overall fund allocation, cost accounting, accounting and analysis, and monitoring major economic activities that may cause economic loss to the company

Assist the CFO to carry out the communication and coordination work between the finance department and internal and external, and complete other daily affairs work assigned by the superior

positions.title: Administrative Manager
positions.description: Develop and implement administrative and logistic management systems; ensure the normal operation of office infrastructure such as water, electricity, network access, etc.; hire and manage specialized staff to undertake office environment cleaning, security, etc.; responsible for daily support work, including but not limited to mail receipt and delivery, office supplies procurement and distribution, staff event planning, staff welfare procurement, etc.; responsible for important administrative support work, including but not limited to fixed asset management, license processing and filing, office rental and decoration, etc.

positions.title: Assistant Administrative Manager
positions.description:
Modern, successful training and continuing education programs tailored to the needs and practical requirements of the participants; modular learning structures based on the building block principle up to a recognized official diploma; short, intensive and compact study programs allowing participants to define precisely the duration of their studies and a flexible training program.

Qualified and dedicated instructors with university degrees or technical college graduates who, in addition to their teaching activities, have expert and managerial functions in practice and are able to communicate the subject matter competently and practically; our experienced staff guarantees comprehensive training advice, including individual learning profiles (according to the participant's interests, skills and goals) and personal career planning

allData.headline: Medical laboratory operations strategy leader | Market insights, investment evaluation and human resource optimization for growth
allData.summary: I am a professional with a rich background in the healthcare industry, committed to making an impact in the fields of operations and human resources. I have extensive experience and skills to effectively manage and optimize the operational processes of healthcare services, while focusing on improving employee well-being and team effectiveness. I have deep expertise in operations management and am good at improving efficiency through technology and process improvements. I have led the execution of multiple complex projects and successfully promoted strategies for cost savings and quality improvement. My methodology includes data-driven decision-making and continuous improvement to ensure that organizations maintain a competitive advantage in the competitive healthcare market. As a healthcare consulting partner, I pursue excellence and leadership in the industry. I hope to use my experience and expertise to continuously drive innovation and excellence in healthcare services and bring lasting value and impact to patients and organizations.
